statements: SELECT * FROM player_authentication;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_authentication WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT password FROM player_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, password FROM player_authentication WHERE player_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM player_authentication ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_authentication WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM player_authentication WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_authentication WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM player_authentication WHERE player_id = 3 AND password = 'secretpassword';
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_authentication WHERE player_id > 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM players WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM player_scores WHERE score > 1000 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_title, score FROM player_scores WHERE game_title='Chess' ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM players WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM player_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_title, score, timestamp FROM player_scores WHERE score > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM players WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE 'B%';
SELECT player_id, username, email, game_title, score, timestamp FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id WHERE game_title = 'Chess';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM players WHERE player_id = '12345';
SELECT player_id, game_title, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, session_start, session_end FROM player_sessions WHERE player_id = '54321' AND session_start > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM players WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT player_id, username FROM players WHERE player_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, game_title, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT session_id, player_id, session_start, session_end FROM player_sessions WHERE player_id='987e6543-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY session_start DESC;
SELECT p.player_id, p.username, ps.game_title, ps.score FROM players p JOIN player_scores ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id WHERE ps.score >= 500 ORDER BY ps.score DESC, p.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_title, game_genre FROM games ORDER BY game_release_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id WHERE player_scores.game_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, MAX(player_score) AS highest_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_title, game_genre, game_release_date FROM games ORDER BY game_release_date DESC;

SELECT player_name, player_email, player_scores.player_score, games.game_title FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id JOIN games ON player_scores.game_id = games.game_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT player_name, player_email, session_start, session_end FROM player_sessions WHERE session_end IS NULL ORDER BY session_start ASC;
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM players WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT title, genre FROM games WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT player_id, game_id, start_time FROM player_sessions WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT game_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM game_reviews GROUP BY game_id HAVING avg_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT title, genre, release_date FROM games WHERE platform = 'PC' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, start_time FROM player_sessions WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT review_id, game_id, rating, review_date FROM game_reviews WHERE rating > 4.0;
